user_prompt: Generate a problem Sowftware Engineer intern can solve in 30 minutes

problem.description: Given an array of integers, find the maximum sum of a subarray within the given array. A subarray is a contiguous part of the array.

code:
numbers = list(map(int, input().split()))
max_sum = float('-inf')
current_sum = 0
for num in numbers:
    current_sum = max(num, current_sum + num)
    max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
print(max_sum)
